segments.text: I am increasingly concerned about the hazards present in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most immediate danger I see is the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is truly wobbly; I can almost feel it teetering beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall backward at any second, and that would be a terrible accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is also becoming quite wet and slippery from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid someone, perhaps the woman or one of the children, will slip on that expanding puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes and injuries seem like a real possibility here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating that the woman remains so unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could easily prevent these potential mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, for their part, are too focused on the cookies to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
